title:
A Lie characterization of the Bousfield-Kan ${\mathbb{Q}}$-completion
  and ${\mathbb{Q}}$-good spaces
authors: Yves F\'elix, Mario Fuentes and Aniceto Murillo
abstract:
We prove that the unit of the Quillen pair ${\mathfrak{L}}\colon {\bf
sset}\rightleftarrows {\bf cdgl}\colon {\langle\,\cdot\,\rangle}$ given by the
model and realization functor is, up to homotopy, the Bousfield-Kan
${\mathbb{Q}}$-completion.
